news_header: The net assets of Germany's second most popular party, AfD, have surged due to significant donations, increasing by EUR 14.8 million from 2022. A major contributor, Helga Schwab, donated EUR 5.9 million and two apartment blocks worth over EUR 2 million. This has raised AfD's total net assets from EUR 23.5 million to EUR 38.3 million.
news_original_title: Saksan laitaoikeiston AfD rikastuu lahjoituksilla – berliiniläisnaiselta kuuden miljoonan euron perintö
news_text: Additionally, inventor Reiner Strangfeld, who committed suicide in 2018, left over EUR 10 million to the party, mostly in gold bars.
